items.title: Israel to bar 37 aid groups from Gaza
items.title_zh: 以色列禁止37个援助团体进入加沙
items.summary: Israel is to revoke the licenses of 37 aid groups working in Gaza and the occupied West Bank, saying they failed to meet requirements under new registration rules.
items.summary_zh: 以色列将吊销在加沙和被占领西岸工作的37个援助团体的执照,说这些团体不符合新的登记规则的要求。

items.title: Eurostar warns of ongoing delays after services resume
items.title_zh: Eurostar警告在恢复服务后持续拖延
items.summary: Some Eurostar services have resumed after all trains from London to Paris, Amsterdam and Brussels were cancelled due to a power outage in the Channel Tunnel.
items.summary_zh: 在从伦敦到巴黎,阿姆斯特丹和布鲁塞尔的所有列车因海峡隧道停电而取消后,一些欧洲之星服务已经恢复.

items.summary_zh: 扬中先生 “如果可以与政府讨论,请参与”

items.title: ロシア “ウクライナとの和平案めぐる交渉姿勢は強硬になる”
items.title_zh: 俄罗斯 “与乌克兰的谈判态势变得强劲”

items.summary_zh: 中国陆军对台湾施加高压 军事演习第二天"火力公告".

items.title_zh: 巴拿马运河的中国工人纪念碑被地方当局重修

items.summary_zh: 中国在美国国务院"上"柜台向台湾出售武器的制裁.

items.title: 正月 餅の窒息事故 消費者庁が注意を呼びかけ
items.title_zh: 新年莫奇窒息事故 消费者机构呼吁注意

items.title: およそ50年続いてきた ガソリン税の暫定税率 きょう廃止
items.title_zh: 大约50年的暂定税率
items.summary: ガソリン小売価格 全国平均1リットル158円 7週連続で値下がり
items.summary_zh: 汽油零售价格 平均1升158日元 连续7周

items.title: 中国軍 台湾周辺で2日連続で軍事演習 台湾 頼清徳総統が反発

items.title: UAE says it will withdraw from Yemen after Saudi strike on separatist-held port
items.title_zh: 阿联酋说,在沙特袭击分裂主义控制的港口后,它将撤出也门。
items.summary: The United Arab Emirates has said it will withdraw its remaining forces from Yemen, after Saudi Arabia backed a demand from the Yemeni presidential council for them to leave within 24 hours.
items.summary_zh: 阿拉伯联合酋长国说,在沙特阿拉伯支持也门总统委员会要求他们在24小时内撤离之后,它将从也门撤出剩余的部队。

items.title: The 'thorny' issues that threaten to derail a Russia-Ukraine peace deal
items.title_zh: 可能破坏俄乌克兰和约的"大问题"
items.summary: Russia, the US and Ukraine agree that a deal on ending almost four years of full-scale war is edging closer but, in the words of President Donald Trump, "one or two very thorny, very tough issues" remain.
items.summary_zh: 俄国、美国和乌克兰都同意, 结束近四年全面战争的协议正在逐渐逼近,

items.title: Thieves use drill to steal €30m in German bank heist
items.title_zh: 小偷用钻头在德国银行抢劫三千万欧元
items.summary: Thieves used a large drill to break into a safe at a high street bank branch in western Germany and steal an estimated €30m (£26m; $35m) in cash and valuables, police have said.
items.summary_zh: 据警方说,盗贼利用大型钻头在德国西部的一家高架街道银行分行闯入保险柜,并盗取了约3000万欧元(2600万英镑;3500万美元)的现金和贵重物品.

items.title: Protests spread across Iran for third day after currency hits record low
items.title_zh: 伊朗各地的抗议活动在创纪录以来,
items.summary: Protests and strikes in Iran over inflation and currency devaluation have spread from the capital, Tehran, to several other cities on a third day of unrest.
items.summary_zh: 伊朗因通货膨胀和货币贬值而发生的抗议和罢工在动乱的第三天从首都德黑兰蔓延到其他几个城市。

items.title: Guinea junta chief takes lead in controversial election as social media restricted
items.title_zh: 由于社交媒体的限制,
items.summary: Guinea's junta leader Gen Mamady Doumbouya has taken a huge lead in a presidential election his main challengers were barred from contesting, initial results show.
items.summary_zh: 几内亚军政府领导人Gen Mamady Doumbouya在总统选举中领先,

items.title: 江口寿史さん 写真を無断使用しイラスト制作した問題でおわび
items.title_zh: 江口俊夫的照片未经许可使用,并创作出插图.
items.summary: 生成AI 検索サービスで報道記事無断引用 公取委が実態調査へ
items.summary_zh: AI 搜索服务

items.title: K-pop band member sued for $30m after bitter record label feud
items.title_zh: K-pop乐队成员在苦痛唱片被封杀后起诉了30万美元
items.summary: Chart-topping K-pop band NewJeans' record label, Ador, is suing one of the band's members in what is yet another twist in their bitter year-long feud.
items.summary_zh: Chart-toping K-pop乐队NewJeans的唱片标签Ador正在起诉乐队成员之一,这是他们在长达一年之久的怨恨中的另一个曲折。

items.title: Ukraine denies drone attack on Putin's residence
items.title_zh: 乌克兰否认无人机袭击普京住宅
items.summary: President Volodymyr Zelensky has denied allegations by Russia that Ukraine launched a drone attack on one of President Vladimir Putin's residences, and accused Moscow of trying to derail peace talks.
items.summary_zh: 沃洛德米尔·泽连斯基总统否认俄罗斯指控乌克兰对弗拉基米尔·普京总统官邸之一发动无人机袭击,并指责莫斯科试图破坏和谈.

items.title: French right pushes for national tribute to film star Brigitte Bardot
items.title_zh: 法国右派向电影明星Brigitte Bardot致敬
items.summary: French right-wing figure Éric Ciotti has called for a national tribute to honour film legend Brigitte Bardot, prompting objections from political opponents on the left.
items.summary_zh: 法国右翼人物埃里克·克奥蒂(Éric Ciotti)呼吁举行全国致敬来纪念电影传奇"布里吉特·巴多",引发了左翼政治对手的反对.

items.title: Turkey detains 357 suspected IS members in nationwide raids
items.title_zh: 土耳其在全国搜捕中拘留了357名可疑IS成员。
items.summary: More than 350 suspected Islamic State group (IS) members have been detained as part of nationwide police operations in Turkey.
items.summary_zh: 作为土耳其全国警察行动的一部分,350多名伊斯兰国家集团嫌疑成员被拘押。

items.title: Why Israel's recognition of Somaliland as an independent state is controversial
items.title_zh: 以色列为何承认索马里兰为独立国家有争议.
items.summary: Israel has taken the controversial decision to recognise the breakaway state of Somaliland as an independent nation, sparking condemnation from many other countries.
items.summary_zh: 以色列作出了一项有争议的决定,承认索马里兰分裂的国家是一个独立国家,这引起了许多其他国家的谴责。

items.title: Trump says US hit 'big facility' linked to alleged Venezuelan drug boats
items.title_zh: 特朗普说,美国打击了"大设施" 与委内瑞拉毒船有关
items.summary: Donald Trump has said that the US carried out a strike on a "dock area" linked to alleged Venezuelan drug boats.
items.summary_zh: 唐纳德·特朗普(Donald Trump)表示,美国对一个与据称委内瑞拉毒船相联的"码头地区"进行了打击.

items.title: Anthony Joshua injured in Nigeria car crash that killed two team members
items.title_zh: Anthony Joshua在尼日利亚车祸中受伤,
items.summary: British heavyweight boxer Anthony Joshua has been injured in a car crash in Nigeria, which killed two members of his team.
items.summary_zh: 英国重量级拳击手安东尼·约书亚在尼日利亚的一出车祸中被击伤,导致他队有两名队员丧生.

items.title: Khaleda Zia: Slain leader's widow who went on to lead Bangladesh
items.title_zh: 卡莉达·齐亚:前去领导孟加拉国的被害领袖遗孀
items.summary: Khaleda Zia, who has died at the age of 80, was Bangladesh's first female prime minister.
items.summary_zh: 卡莉达·齐亚已逝世,享年80岁,是孟加拉国首位女性总理.

items.title: Bangladesh's first female prime minister Khaleda Zia dies aged 80
items.title_zh: 孟加拉国首位女总理卡莉达·齐亚逝世 享年80岁.
items.summary: Khaleda Zia, Bangladesh's first female prime minister and an arch-rival of ousted leader Sheikh Hasina, has died from a prolonged illness. She was 80 years old.
items.summary_zh: 孟加拉国第一位女性总理和被罢免的领导人谢赫·哈西娜(Sheikh Hasina)的顶级竞争者Khaleda Zia已因长期患病而死亡。 当时她已经80了.

items.title: Trump hopes to reach phase two of Gaza ceasefire 'very quickly'
items.title_zh: 特朗普希望尽快实现加沙停火第二阶段。
items.summary: Donald Trump said he hoped to reach phase two of the Gaza peace plan "very quickly", as he warned Hamas would have "hell to pay" if it did not disarm soon.
items.summary_zh: 唐纳德·特朗普表示他希望能"很快地"达到加沙和平计划的第二阶段,因为他警告说,如果哈马斯不尽快解除武装,那么哈马斯会"付出代价".

items.title: Spanish woman who found fame for botching fresco restoration dies
items.title_zh: 西班牙女人因为修复壁画而出名
items.summary: The Spanish parishioner who made headlines around the world for her botched restoration of a prized Jesus Christ fresco has died aged 94.
items.summary_zh: 西班牙教区教友曾在世界各地做头条新闻,为她修复一幅被赞誉为"耶稣基督"的壁画,她已经去世了94岁.

items.title: What growing up in war does to a child's brain - and how it really affects them years later
items.title_zh: 在战争中成长对孩子的大脑有何影响 以及它如何真正影响他们多年
items.summary: Content warning: this article includes details about the impact of conflict on children in war zones and descriptions of injuries that some readers may find distressing.
items.summary_zh: 内容警告:这篇文章详细介绍了冲突对战区儿童的影响,并描述了一些读者可能感到痛苦的伤害.

items.title: 'No worries': Trump downplays Chinese military drills around Taiwan
items.title_zh: [永久失效連結] "不用担心":特朗普淡化中国在台湾搞军事演习
items.summary: US President Donald Trump has said he is not worried about China's military drills around the self-governed island of Taiwan, which it claims as its own.
items.summary_zh: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普表示,他并不担心中国在自管的台湾岛周围的军事演习,它声称台湾是自己的.

items.title: Alleged Bondi gunmen acted alone and did not train in the Philippines, police say
items.title_zh: 据称邦迪枪手独自行动,没有在菲律宾受训,警方说
items.summary: The two alleged gunmen who killed 15 people at a Jewish event on Bondi Beach were not part of a wider terror cell and acted alone, Australian police have said.
items.summary_zh: 澳大利亚警方说,两名据称在邦迪海滩的一次犹太人事件中杀害了15人的枪手不是更广泛的恐怖小组的成员,而是单独行动的。

items.title: Great white sharks face extinction in Mediterranean, say researchers
items.title_zh: 大白鲨在地中海面临灭绝 研究人员说
items.summary: Great white sharks in the Mediterranean Sea are in danger of disappearing, with illegal fishing contributing to their decline.
items.summary_zh: 地中海的大白鲨有消失的危险,非法捕鱼助长了鲨鱼的衰落.

items.title: The fight over Christian nationalism in a small Tennessee town
items.title_zh: 田纳西州小镇的基督教民族主义斗争
items.summary: As Josh Abbotoy gazes out at lush green woods and pastureland nestled among Tennessee's Appalachian hills, he describes what he intends to build here: a neighbourhood with dozens of residential lots, centred around a working farm and, crucially, a church.
items.summary_zh: Josh Abbotoy在田纳西州的阿巴拉契山丘上 凝视着茂盛的绿树林和牧场 他描述了他打算在这里建造的建筑: 一个拥有数十个住宅区的街区, 以一个工作农场为中心, 最重要的是,一个教堂。

items.title: Brazil's Bolsonaro undergoes second medical procedure for hiccups
items.title_zh: 巴西的Bolsonaro接受打嗝的第二次医疗手术
items.summary: Brazil's imprisoned former president, Jair Bolsonaro, has undergone a second medical procedure in just three days to treat his persistent hiccups.
items.summary_zh: 巴西被囚禁的前总统贾伊尔·博尔索纳罗在短短三天内接受了第二次医疗手术来治疗他持续的打嗝.

items.title: Naan: How the 'world's best bread' travelled from Islamic courts to our plates
items.title_zh: 纳安:"世界最好的面包"如何从伊斯兰法院来到我们的盘子
items.summary: A pillowy-soft naan - a leavened flatbread popular in South Asia - paired with rich, creamy butter chicken gravy is one of the most popular comfort foods in the region, and it's also one of the most popular Indian dishes abroad.
items.summary_zh: 枕花软 na菜(学名:A subbyy-soft naan)-是南亚流行的一种落叶扁面包,与丰富而奶油黄油花鸡肉汁相配,是该地区最受欢迎的舒适食品之一,也是海外最受欢迎的印度菜肴之一.

items.title: Coups, elections and protests - a difficult year for democracy in Africa
items.title_zh: 政变、选举和抗议 -- -- 非洲民主困难的一年
items.summary: October's shocking events in Tanzania offer a snapshot of some of the tensions which have shaped a difficult year for African politics.
items.summary_zh: 10月在坦桑尼亚发生的令人震惊的事件,

items.title: Russia's losses in Ukraine rise faster than ever as US pushes for peace deal
items.title_zh: 俄国在乌克兰的损失比以往任何时期都快,
items.summary: Over the past 10 months, Russian losses in the war with Ukraine have been growing faster than any time since the start of the full-scale invasion in 2022, BBC analysis suggests.
items.summary_zh: 在过去的10个月中,俄罗斯在与乌克兰的战争中的损失比2022年全面入侵开始以来的任何时间都快了,BBC分析认为.

items.title: Nepal to scrap 'failed' Mount Everest waste deposit scheme
items.title_zh: 尼泊尔拆除"失败"的珠穆朗玛峰垃圾存放计划
items.summary: A scheme to encourage climbers to bring their waste down from Mount Everest is being scrapped - with Nepalese authorities telling the BBC it has been a failure.
items.summary_zh: 尼泊尔当局告诉英国广播公司说,

items.title: US pledges $2bn for humanitarian aid, but tells UN 'adapt or die'
items.title_zh: 美国承诺提供2 Bn的人道主义援助,
items.summary: The United States has pledged $2 billion (£1.5bn) to fund United Nations (UN) humanitarian programmes, but has warned the UN it must "adapt or die".
items.summary_zh: 美国已承诺提供20亿美元(1.5bn英镑)来资助联合国人道主义方案,但警告联合国必须"适应或死".

items.title: China holds military drills around Taiwan as warning to 'separatist forces'
items.title_zh: 中国在台湾周围举行军事演习,
items.summary: China is holding military drills around Taiwan simulating the seizure and blockade of the island's key areas, as a warning against "separatist forces".
items.summary_zh: 中国正在台湾周围举行军事演习,模拟夺取并封锁了该岛的关键地区,以示对"分裂势力"的警告.

items.title: Thailand accuses Cambodia of breaking newly signed ceasefire deal
items.title_zh: 泰国指责柬埔寨违反新签署的停火协议
items.summary: Thailand's army has accused Cambodia of breaching a newly signed ceasefire deal reached after weeks of deadly clashes that forced nearly one million people from their homes.
items.summary_zh: 泰国军队指责柬埔寨在数周的致命冲突后违反新签署的停火协议,迫使近一百万人离家出走.

items.title: John Simpson: 'I've reported on 40 wars but I've never seen a year like 2025'
items.title_zh: 约翰·辛普森(John Simpson):"我报道了40场战争,但我从未见过像2025这样的一年".
items.summary: Sensitive content: This article contains a graphic description of death that some readers may find upsetting
items.summary_zh: 敏感内容:这篇文章包含了一些读者可能发现令人不快的死亡图形描述.

items.title: 'There are many challenges': Syrians in Turkey consider return after fall of Assad
items.title_zh: “有许多挑战”: 土耳其的叙利亚人考虑在阿萨德倒台后返回
items.summary: The pull of home can be strong – even when it is a place you can't remember.
items.summary_zh: 家的拉力可以很强,即使这是一个你不记得的地方。

items.title: An orphan's brutal murder shines a spotlight on child abuse in Somalia
items.title_zh: 杀害孤儿的残酷行径使人们关注索马里的虐待儿童行为。
items.summary: A woman is currently awaiting execution in Somalia after being convicted of killing a 14-year-old girl in her care.
items.summary_zh: 一名妇女目前在索马里等待处决,因为她被判定杀害了在她照料下的一名14岁女孩。

items.title: Living in fear of Lakurawa - the militant group Trump targeted in Nigeria strikes
items.title_zh: 生活在对拉库拉瓦的恐惧之中,
items.summary: Deep fear has long pervaded the arid savannah plains and highlands of north-western Nigeria - even before the US air strikes on the Islamist militants who have made this area their base on Christmas night.
items.summary_zh: 尼日利亚西北部干旱的草原平原和高地早已充满了深层恐惧,

items.title: Trump and Zelensky appear more upbeat - but show little evidence that peace is near for Ukraine
items.title_zh: 特朗普和泽连斯基看起来比较乐观,
items.summary: The much-anticipated talks lasted two-and-a-half hours, and that's an achievement in itself. Presidents Trump and Zelensky had never before spent this long in one room, negotiating.
items.summary_zh: 人们期待已久的会谈持续了两个半小时,这本身就是一项成就。 特朗普总统和泽连斯基总统以前从未在同一个房间里花过这么长的时间进行谈判.

items.title: Toxic air, broken roads and unpicked rubbish - why India's big cities are becoming unliveable
items.title_zh: 有毒的空气,破碎的公路和未经挑选的垃圾——为什么印度的大城市变得无法生存.
items.summary: "Want the royal charm of Jaipur? Don't come here, just buy a postcard," a local taxi driver quipped during my recent visit to the north-western Indian city.
items.summary_zh: "想要斋浦尔的皇家魅力吗? 不要来这里,只要买张明信片,"一名当地出租车司机在我最近访问印度西北部城市时被抽打.

items.title: Catching the hunters trapping rare songbirds in China
items.title_zh: 捕捉中国珍稀歌鸟的猎人
items.summary: Silva Gu's eyes dart back and forth across miles of tall grassland, scouring it for signs of life in the darkness.
items.summary_zh: 席尔瓦 古斯的眼睛飞来飞去 穿越了几英里高的草地 寻找黑暗中的生命迹象

items.title: Brigitte Bardot: From French cinema to international fame
items.title_zh: Brigitte Bardot:从法国电影院到国际名人
items.summary: Brigitte Bardot, the French model and actress, has died at the age of 91.
items.summary_zh: 法国模特和女演员布里吉特·巴多特逝世 享年91岁.

items.title: Snow-capped Mount Etna erupts as skiers glide down slopes
items.title_zh: 雪盖的埃特纳山在滑雪者滑下山坡时爆发
items.summary: Huge plumes of ash and smoke were filmed erupting from Mount Etna, Sicily on 27 December as skiers used the slopes below.
items.summary_zh: 12月27日,在滑雪者使用下方的斜坡时,从西西里岛埃特纳山喷出出大量的火山灰和烟雾。

items.title: Watch: Meteor lights up sky over Japan's Mount Fuji
items.title_zh: 观察:日本富士山上空的气象灯光
items.summary: CCTV footage from Japan's Hiratsuka City Museum captured the moment a meteor soared through the night sky over Japan's Mount Fuji on Friday.
items.summary_zh: 日本平津市博物馆的CCTV镜头拍摄了星期五日本富士山上空一发流星从夜空飞过一瞬间.

items.title: Watch: Pope Leo's plea for peace in Christmas message
items.title_zh: 观看:教宗李敖在圣诞贺词中呼吁和平
items.summary: Pope Leo has called for an end to conflicts around the world during his first Christmas remarks to crowds in St Peter's Square.
items.summary_zh: 教宗利奥在对圣彼得广场上人群的首次圣诞节演讲中呼吁结束世界各地的冲突.

items.title: Where is Santa now? Trump answers kids' Christmas calls to Norad tracker
items.title_zh: 圣诞老人现在在哪里? 特朗普给诺拉德的圣诞电话
items.summary: Norad, the North American Aerospace Defense Command, has kicked off its 70-year tradition of tracking Santa Claus on Christmas Eve, with US President Donald Trump joining.
items.summary_zh: 北美航空航天防卫司令部的诺拉德在圣诞节前夜摆脱了追踪圣诞老人的70年传统,美国总统唐纳德·特朗普也加入.
